release.action: Added load test cases and JMeter plans.
Fixed issue 50: Remove systematic final attributes on methods.
Fixed issue 51: Remove static attribute on commons logging logger.

Changed correlation ID management. We now correlate on messageID so that it is consistent between LegStar messaging and CICS MQ Bridge. The zOS mq module still has the capability to correlate of correlation ID though for backward compatibility.
Fixed issue a minor issue with close which was not nullifying queues and queue managers.

Added support for IBM MQ Bridge. A new configuration option results in legstar sending an MQCIH header rather than a LegStar header. With this option, there is no need to install LegStar on the mainframe.
Added sample to showcase usage of the invoker and provide sample configuration.
Added automatic upload of ZOS sources to mainframe to help with distribution of ZOS artifacts.
Documentation update to cross reference the new distribution-zos project.
Uses new naming convention for LegStar messaging classes.
First version of the mq connectivity.
